ost_step.2: The total cost of these stamps is represented by the height of the bar labeled "$70\text{'s}$".

direct_answer.text: To calculate the average price, first determine the total cost of the stamps from the $70$'s, as indicated by the height of the bar labeled "$70$'s$, which is $12\times6=72$ cents.
